name: estrella
description: Light-weight program and library around the esbuild compiler

scripts.build-rescue: esbuild --platform=node --minify-whitespace --bundle --outfile=dist/estrella.js --external:esbuild --external:fsevents --define:DEBUG=1 --define:VERSION='"0.0.0-rescue"' src/estrella.js && chmod +x dist/estrella.js && echo 'Wrote dist/estrella.js'

author: Rasmus Andersson <rsms.me>
